activities: Scopely collects data from individuals who accept Scopely's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service and use Scopely's social gaming applications and websites. Scopely collects personal information such as account registration information, profile information, technical information (e.g., MAC Address, IP Address, device identifiers), and geo-location information. Scopely uses this information to provide the service, including allowing users to connect with their friends, track installs, target advertising, and deliver notifications on game events and new products and features. This information is collected in accordance with Scopely's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
